title: Duck vindaloo
ingredients: ['1 (2kg) whole duck', '6 red chillies, seeded', '2 cloves garlic, crushed', '180ml malt vinegar', '1 tablespoon diced fresh root ginger', '1 teaspoon turmeric', '1 teaspoon cumin seeds', '1 teaspoon coriander seeds', '1/2 teaspoon cardamom seeds', '1/2 teaspoon fenugreek seeds', '1 tablespoon sugar', '3 tablespoons ghee (or butter)']
